Description.Text: Dating from the 17th Century, the hotel is a comfortable blend of old and new, creating an atmosphere which is relaxed, informal and individual. With elegant rooms, delicious award-winning food, a friendly bar and exceptional service, the Ormond is the perfect location for business or pleasure. A traditional coaching inn, The Ormond has been added to over the centuries and the latest alterations were carried out around 1900 when the new Victorian facade was added to the structure. During the 1st World War it was used as an army telegraphic and postal station for communications to soldiers fighting in France and in the 2nd World War American soldiers occupied the hotel to convalesce from injuries sustained in battle. The hotel has it on good authority that American Generals also met at the hotel for part of the planning for the Omaha Invasion in June 1944! Since these times the Ormond has gone through much change and the hotel has done much to bring back the atmospheric character of the building. Whether you are just dropping by for a relaxing drink at the end of a hard week this winter or staying with the hotel to explore the area, the hotel will go out or the way to make you feel welcome. The mulled wine is back on the bar in December and as always the fire will be on and candles burning to warm up these cold winter evenings. Board games, magazines and the new sofa area has recently been added to make you stay as comfortable as possible. As you would expect from a building that dates from the 17th century, the bedrooms come in a variety of shapes and sizes, all with their own distinctive character. All rooms have flat screen LCD TVs with Free-view. All have tea & coffee making facilities in the room or you can order room service if you wish. Cots are available for babies, with a baby basket of essentials provided in case you've forgotten anything. Monitors work in the restaurant or bar from most of the bedrooms or the hotel can organize a professional babysitter.

Located in the centre of Tetbury, The Ormond is a stylish, Cotswold inn within easy reach of Westonbirt Arboretum, High-grove and the market towns of Cirencester and Stroud, providing an ideal base for discovering this area of outstanding natural beauty with its many picturesque villages. Tetbury, has an array of beautiful old buildings, independent boutiques and galleries and is made for exploring, or the hotel can arrange activities for you. From hiring a classic car to 18 holes of golf, flying lessons or clay pigeon shooting there is plenty to occupy you for a few days away.

Superior Double - Superior Double Room offers one king size bed with basic amenities. The superior rooms are larger than the standard rooms and have all been fully renovated to offer contemporary comforts. These rooms have stunning king size beds and large bathrooms with showers. Individually designed to incorporate the features you would expect, including pocket spring mattresses, goose down duvets, powerful hairdryer, large flat screen TV with free-view, WiFi, digital clock radio, tea and coffee making facilities and quality cookies.
Standard Twin - Standard Twin Room offers two twin beds with basic amenities. The hotel has two twin rooms with two single beds. Pocket sprung mattresses, goose down duvets, crisp linen sheets, bathrooms with shower hairdryer, flat screen TV with free-view, WiFi, digital clock radio, tea and coffee making facilities and quality cookies.
Family Room - Family Room offers one double size bed and one twin bed with basic amenities. The hotel has three rooms with a double bed and single bed which can be used as a family room or a superior twin. Generally larger, one of these rooms will comfortably take a Z bed or cot to accommodate a family of four. They feature bathrooms with shower, goose down duvets, powerful hairdryer, large flat screen TV with free-view, WiFi, digital clock radio, tea and coffee making facilities and quality cookies.
Standard - Double - Standard - Double Room offers one double size bed with basic amenities. These rooms have double beds and en-suite shower bathroom. Each has been individually designed to incorporate all the features you would expect, including new pocket sprung mattresses, goose down duvets, powerful hairdryer, flat screen TV, WiFi, digital clock radio, tea and coffee making facilities and quality cookies.
